Title: Worldsoul: Encore!
Description:
Have you seen the fliers around? They're staging some earthen plays in the Proscenium!

I can't remember the last time I've seen a play, but I've got my hands full, as usual. You'll go, right?

I'm sure everyone here could use their spirits raised. A play might be just the thing everyone needs. Make sure it's a night to remember!
ObjectivesText: Participate in the Theater Troupe event and complete World Quests in Khaz Algar
